words.def: the uneven manner of walking that results from an injured leg
a sharp high-pitched cry (especially by a dog)
one of the strands twisted together to make yarn or rope or thread
either of two fleshy folds of tissue that surround the mouth and play a role in speaking
a Cypriot monetary unit equal to one thousandth of a pound
destruction of heart tissue resulting from obstruction of the blood supply to the heart muscle
the ratio of the circumference to the diameter of a circle
a soft silver-white univalent element of the alkali metal group
